name: ORGANIC FRESH START JUICE
description: Fresh Start promises to wake you up with non-stop flavor from the initial tang of lemon to the soothing taste of ginger. This 100% juice is Living Juice's lemon pH balancer made only from organic lemon, organic apple and organic ginger.

name: ORGANIC CARROT KICK JUICE
description: Made of organic carrots, oranges, and yellow beets, Carrot Kick is as colorful as it is delicious! This sweet juice is filled to the brim with Beta Carotene, essential vitamins and nutrients.

name: ORGANIC RED RADIANCE JUICE
description: With a mix of organic strawberry, red apple and beet, the taste and experience of this cold-pressed Red Radiance can't be beet! Red Radiance has a taste so sweet you wouldn't believe all the minerals, vitamins and essential fatty acids that are in just one bottle.

name: ORGANIC PINEAPPLE PUNCH JUICE
description: Pineapple Punch is Living Juice's sweet green juice. Bursting with organic kale, pineapple and apple this juice delivers the flavor with no added water or sugar!

name: ORGANIC GREEN VITALITY JUICE
description: Packed with fresh, organic green vegetables, Green Vitality provides a powerful combination of anti-oxidizing ingredients, vitamins and minerals. This savory juice will cleanse your body, leaving you energized and feeling great!

name: KRU COLD BREW
description: Cold brew nitro coffee from our friends at kru coffee.

name: LEMONADE
description: Organic Lemonade with Lemon + Turmeric + Cane Sugar

name: ICED TEA
description: Organic Unsweet Green Tea: Green Tea + Orange Blossom + Mint

name: ARNOLD PALMER
description: Organic Unsweet Green Tea + Lemonade

description: GF Oats + Chia Seeds + Almond Butter + Maple Syrup + Oat Milk + Cinnamon + Coconut + CHOICE OF FRUIT

name: CREAMY TOMATO SOUP
description: A delicious medley of cheddar, tomatoes, light cream, spices + garlic all simmered in a rich broth, with choice of bread. Vegetarian

name: BEEF CHILI
description: Classic chili full of chunks of beef, kidney and black beans and red, yellow and green bell peppers. Simmered in a flavorful blend of tomatoes and spices, with choice of bread. Gluten Free

name: CHICKEN SAUSAGE + KALE SOUP
description: Made with Chicken Italian Sausage, kale, onions, brown rice, sweet potatoes, celery, white beans and carrots. Gluten Free

name: BROCCOLI + CHEDDAR SOUP
description: Everyone's favorite soup made with generous pieces of broccoli, creamy sharp cheddar cheese and a touch of spice, with choice of bread. Gluten Free + Vegetarian
